entries.title: US-China chip war: How the technology dispute is playing out
entries.description: Washington announced some of the broadest export controls on chipmakers in October.

entries.title: Former US President Donald Trump launches $99 NFT collection
entries.description: They depict the former US president in various guises including a superhero, astronaut and Nascar driver.

entries.title: Skilled tech workers snapped up despite downturn
entries.description: For those with experience in AI, automation and cloud computing the tech downturn is not a big problem.
